name: Treasure trove run
description:
A randomised endless runner where you are a brave treasure hunter who has awoken an ancient demigod. You must try and collect the scattered treasure and survive as long as you can.

Alot of time and effort was put in to make this as fun as possible so I hope you enjoy and support the game. (Also let me know your high score !).

Also please visit my website to see my other games and content  www.thatcherproductions.org

and support me on Patreon

www.patreon.com/thatcherproductions
